name: 1HP Run
description:
Recommended to play fullscreen

1HP Run is a casual platforming game that make players traverse the level while having only 1HP left, meaning a single hit from the dangerous terrains or enemies would result in death ergo restart from the beginning of the current level. So have fun and good luck. Once players have finished with the second level, they will be sent back to the first level to replay.

Side note: Only the character is my own, the rest is either from external sources
